name: CMFallDetectionManager
desc: An object for managing fall detection events.

items.name: class var isAvailable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the current device supports fall detection.

items.name: func requestAuthorization(handler: (CMAuthorizationStatus) -> Void)
items.desc: Requests authorization to receive notifications about fall detection events.

items.name: var authorizationStatus: CMAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: The authorization status for receiving fall detection event notifications.

items.name: enum CMAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: The authorization status for motion-related features.

items.name: var delegate: CMFallDetectionDelegate?
items.desc: A delegate that can receive notifications about fall detection events.

items.name: protocol CMFallDetectionDelegate
items.desc: A delegate that receives information about fall detection events and authorization status changes.
